comments.body:
In the test cases... the last test... there is a comment on what doesn't work.
It doesn't show an error (everything compiles), but it doesn't match the _ChainOfArrays line, it falls back to the _Chain line and the flatten function returns any instead of the correct type.
I would think they should behave identically, so this might be a TypeScript issue?
Ideally I would like the test case to throw an error if any was returned (instead of the desired type). But I couldn't figure out how to implement that (as any generally doesn't throw errors).
